text: Ne uverovali te, kotoryye utverzhdayut: "Voistinu, Allakh - eto Messiya, syn Maryam". Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Kto khot' v chem-nibud' mozhet pomeshat' Allakhu, yesli On pozhelayet pogubit' Messiyu, syna Maryam, vmeste s yego mater'yu i temi, kto na zemle, -vsekh?" Allakhu prinadlezhit vlast' nad nebesami i nad zemley i vsem tem, chto mezhdu nimi. On sozdayet to, chto pozhelayet, i vlasten Allakh nad vsem sushchim
